title: Any site reserved for specific purpose in the development plan may be allowed to be developed for any other public purpose with the permission of the Government
clause_text: Any site reserved for specific purpose in the development plan may be allowed to be developed for any other public purpose with the permission of the Government. In doing so, buildable reservation may be allowed to be developed for buildable or open / recreational uses and open / recreational reservation may be allowed to be developed for open / recreational uses only.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
